name: Drive Race 3D!
description:
Race to the finish line and destroy anyone who gets in your way!

How to Play:

- Swipe left/right on the screen to steer your vehicle
- Collect wrenches and tires to fill up your transform meter
- Filling up your transform meter will allow you to transform into new vehicle designs
- You also gain more speed and power to overtake and destroy your opponents
- Hitting opponents will drain your transform meter, so keep collecting items!
